name: Al Muhsi
description: Al Muhsi is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meanings 'The All-Enumerating' or 'The Counter'.
summary: The name Al Muhsi signifies Allah’s attribute of being fully aware of everything that exists, counting all actions and deeds, ensuring nothing is overlooked. This name emphasizes the concept of accountability in the hereafter, where every action will be recorded and judged. The origin of this name is from the Arabic root 'حَصَرَ' which means to enumerate or count.
